summary: Adds 57 swords, greatswords, and daggers to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
"This is tagged as a mod resource."

Adds 57 swords, greatswords, and daggers to Skyrim. They can be bought at Warmaidens in Whiterun or if you are a thief you can just swipe one from the table or barrel in there. They are also in a random cell and exterior location(Exterior is outside of the cities). They can all be crafted and tempered. 8 of the swords, greatswords, and daggers are cheap footsoldier gear. They are all realistic looking down to the distal taper, no crazy spikes or odd blade shape. Textures are good enough for me and some are made for specific outfits in my game, screenshots taken from in the CK so lighing and shadows are off.

Optional file is the main esp with the swords added to level lists. Requires main file.

As a mod resource I included the generic soldier weapons because they would be good for a mod that adds generic soldiers. Feel free to add any of them or all of them to your mod. Have fun retexturing them if thats what you enjoy. If you do use one or all please send me a link and add a screenshot or two here.

This is tagged as a mod resource so if you don't like the textures then by all means redo them to suit you and upload your version, I don't care about if you dislike the textures, I don't want to know if you dislike them and I will simply block you from all my files and PM's permanently. As I said this is a mod resource if you dislike the textures then it is up to you to change them and whiny entitled shitheads will not be tolerated. I am open for constructive feedback as in pointing out a mistake in the normal map or something like that along with a how to fix it pointer, "The textures suck" is not constructive.

Skyrim SE version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/8054] Jets Sword Collection [/url]

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Versions and update info:[/size][/color][/b]

V1.0 Initial release

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Compatibility and required files:[/size][/color][/b]

Requires: Skyrim.

Mod compatibilities: May be incompatible with anything that changes the same locations, but that should just be a sword thats not properly placed for the other mod. Will be incompatible with anything that changes Warmaides or their vendor chest.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/b]

Use NMM or the individual downloads or...

Manual for individual files:
1. Unzip/unrar to any location.
2. Copy contents into your Data folder.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Mod Use Permission: [/size][/color][/b]

Mod Authors: Feel free to use in your mod, retexture, whatever as long as you don't sell it. Requires credits.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Credits: [/size][/color][/b]

Bethesda and me.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]My other mods....[/size][/color][/b]
